resources.string:
Plan your wedding right at your fingertips with Weddsource! 
 
Using our remarkable tools the task of organizing your wedding will be
easy and efficient. Manage guest lists, track finances, choose your
vendors, schedule appointments and much more with this wonderful app.


SPECIAL APP FEATURES:


VENDOR DIRECTORY - Customize your chosen vendor list with a
complete vendor directory from all across Ontario.


BUDGET - Keep track of wedding finances in detail with this feature.


NOTES - Include thoughts, to do lists, wedding ideas and other important
details all in your notes.


GUEST LIST - Make customized guest lists for all your wedding events.


CALENDAR - Keep important dates and appointments. 
 
And much more... DOWNLOAD THIS APP NOW!
